thread.section_title: SafeandVaultStore.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SafeandVaultStore.com | www.safeandvaultstore.com
thread.title: Monterey Bay Labratories
thread.title_full: SafeandVaultStore.com reviewed by Monterey Bay Labratories

author: Monterey Bay Labratories
title: Monterey Bay Labratories
text: I have purchased multiple safes for my businesses over the years and always pick one version of the AMSEC fire and burglary safe. I was a bit hesitant to order this safe via Safe and Vault as the price and delivery were significantly less expensive. Honestly their emphasis (over-emphasis?) on checking the safe upon delivery had me somewhat concerned. All my fears were for naught--exactly as described at several hundred dollars less than I found elsewhere.
